personalInfo.splInterest: Watching sports, particularly football and basketball, fishing

tourBios.exmtStatus: Finished T93 at 2015 Web.com Tour Qualifying Tournament
tourBios.curYearHigh: Made his first Web.com Tour start at the Air Capital Classic in his home state of Kansas. Shot 75-66 (missed cut)...Played the Adams Tour in the summer.
tourBios.otherCarHigh: As a junior golfer, was Kansas Junior Player of the Year in 2009 and runner-up in 2010...In high school, won both the 2009 and 2010 Kansas 3A Regional Championship and Kansas 2A State Championship in 2008. Won nine high school tournaments in 2009...While at the U. of Oklahama, earned third-team All-American honors in 2014-15. Was All-Big 12 in 2013-14 and 2014-15. Won the Wyoming Classic in 2014. Was Academic All-Big 12 first team three years. Led the Sooners his senior season with three top-five finishes and eight top 10s...Was a semifinalist at the 2014 U.S. Public Links Championship.
tourBios.personal: Graduated from Sterling (Kan.) High School in 2011...Parents are Jerry and Julie Gellerman...Has one sister, Jamie, a chemical engineer...Played high school basketball, starting his junior and senior years...Intro to golf was playing a Jack Nicklaus course at Breckenridge resort in Colorado at age seven. Was his first "big boy golf experience."...Favorites include Derek Jeter (non-golfer athlete), Oklahoma and Arizona (college teams), Oklahoma City Thunder (pro team), Hawaii (vacation spot), grandma's fudge (food), Pebble Beach (golf course), "The Prestige" and "Good Will Hunting" (movies) and ESPN "SportsCenter" and "Family Guy" (TV shows). Most famous person met is fellow OU supporter Toby Keith...Single best sporting event attended is 2011 OU vs. Notre Dame football game in Norman...Dream foursome would include "Jack, Arnie and Lee"...Not many people know he is a "big-time dog lover"...Bucket list includes traveling Europe and seeing the Eiffel Tower...Twitter handle is @ouknowmike.
